entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
